data.message?: Border operations for CALS tables are being deprecated. We've added a new improved operation which allows you to toggle the selected cell borders in CALS tables. Please check the upgrade instructions for further instructions.

summary: Toggles the borders to solid or none for selected cells based on the given border
mode. The borders will be set to none when there are only solid borders in the
selection, else the borders will be set to solid.

params.name: borderMode
description: The border mode, which can be one of 'all', 'outer', 'inner', 'top',

cals-toggle-borders-for-selected-cells.description: t__Toggle the borders in the selected cells for the border mode.
